metadata.title: CVE-2017-7475 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: Cairo version 1.15.4 is vulnerable to a NULL pointer dereference related to the FT_Load_Glyph and FT_Render_Glyph resulting in an application crash.

notes.note: mdeslaur> as of 2020-11-26, no complete fix from upstream rodrigo-zaiden> as of 2022-05-02, no complete fix from upstream is available. and it seems like it was ignored and won't get a proper fix.

criterions.comment: cairo package in kinetic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
